info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 10:46PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Essex, east central Worcester and central Middlesex Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1046 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stow, or near Marlborough, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Peabody, Methuen, Billerica, Beverly, Marlborough, Woburn, Chelmsford, Andover, Lexington, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Danvers, Wakefield, Reading, Burlington and Wilmington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
